categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A pilot served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during Galactic Civil War with the Galactic Empire. This pilot served under the callsign Feral Leader in the Battle of Cawa City, where they flew a BTL-A4 Y-wing assault starfighter/bomber along with other members of Feral Group. They were tasked with destroying an All Terrain Armored Transport with the  support of A-wings from Green Squadron. The Y-wings dropped magnetising cluster bombs that magnetized to the hull and destroyed the AT-AT.
A pilot using the callsign "Feral Leader" first appeared in the comic book Shattered Empire 2, which was written by Greg Rucka and published by Marvel Comics on October 7, 2015.
